languages.text: Войска, собравшиеся на поверхности мира, будут счастливы услышать триумфальную весть о победе Вольного Торговца.
The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.
languages.original_text: Войска, собравшиеся на поверхности мира, будут счастливы услышать триумфальную весть о победе Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.
Uralon the Cruel is dead. The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing news of this great triumph.
The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.
The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.
The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.

languages.text: Les troupes postées à la surface du monde se réjouiront de cet immense triomphe {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.

traits.locale_text: Uralon le Cruel est mort. Les troupes postées à la surface du monde se réjouiront de cet immense triomphe.

languages.text: 将这个消息通知位于地表的军队，是时候庆祝行商浪人这场伟大的胜利了。
languages.original_text: The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.

traits.locale_text: 残暴者乌拉隆已经死了。将这个消息通知位于地表的军队吧，是时候庆祝这场伟大的胜利了。

languages.text: 自由開拓者の大勝利のニュースを聞いて、それぞれの惑星にいる部隊たちは喜びに沸きあがることだろう。
languages.original_text: The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の大勝利のニュースを聞いて、それぞれの惑星にいる部隊たちは喜びに沸きあがることだろう。

languages.text: Die Truppen auf der Oberfläche des Planeten werden außer sich vor Freude sein, wenn sie vom großen Triumph {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erfahren.
languages.original_text: The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.

traits.locale_text: Uralon der Grausame ist tot. Die Truppen auf der Oberfläche des Planeten werden außer sich vor Freude sein, wenn sie von diesem großen Triumph erfahren.

languages.text: Las tropas de la superficie del planeta se alegrarán al enterarse del gran triunfo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.

traits.locale_text: Uralon el Cruel ha muerto. Las tropas de la superficie del planeta se alegrarán al enterarse de este gran triunfo.

languages.text: Dünyanın yüzeyindeki birlikler, Hür Tacir'in büyük zaferini duyduklarında neşeden havalara uçacak.
languages.original_text: The troops up on the world's surface will rejoice at hearing the news of the Rogue Trader's great triumph.
